## üöÄ SEO Implementation Strategy

### On-Page SEO
1. Title tags with primary keywords
2. Meta descriptions with call-to-action
3. H1-H6 heading hierarchy
4. Keyword density 2-3%
5. Internal linking structure
6. Image alt text optimization
7. URL structure optimization
8. Schema markup implementation

### Off-Page SEO
1. GitHub repository optimization
2. Social media presence
3. Backlink building
4. Guest posting
5. Forum participation
6. Community engagement
7. Influencer outreach
8. Press releases

### Technical SEO
1. Mobile optimization
2. Page speed optimization
3. SSL certificate
4. XML sitemap
5. Robots.txt
6. Canonical tags
7. Structured data
8. Core Web Vitals

### Content SEO
1. Long-form content (2000+ words)
2. Keyword-rich content
3. Regular updates
4. Fresh content
5. Multimedia integration
6. User engagement
7. Social sharing
8. Comment sections
